this_title: Hace mucho que quería decirte que te amo
introduction: Joaquín is in love with his lifelong best friend, Lucía, and is unable to confess it. In addition, Joaquín suffers from narcolepsy and an inconvenient change in his medication leads him to not know the limit between what he dreams and what is really happening. One day, at their usual cafe, Lucia gives him the news that she is getting married and Joaquin, despite being in love, decides to congratulate and support her. The weeks and the wedding preparations go by and Joaquín tries to approach Lucía with the doubt of whether she is really ready to get married or not, causing Lucía, a shock and confusion.
chinese_title: Hace mucho que quería decirte que te amo
